author: Simon Difford
description: The perfect after-dinner cocktail at any time of year but particularly appropriate over the festive period due to its ingredients – Pedro Ximénez sherry tastes like Christmas pudding, mandarins are not just for Christmas and walnuts are best cracked whilst watching a Christmas special.
name: Christmas Special

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
